snippet.title: Ritual: Sorcerer Angel - Gameplay & Tips - The Beginning
snippet.description:
GAMEPLAY TIPS IN THE DESCRIPTION!
Cast spells and watch your Sorcerer bounce around!
There are no movement controls. Everything else happens on its own.
Killing enemies gives you experience and increases your Power level.
Stronger enemies are dangerous - their Strength number is displayed in orange. Try to wound them, stun them, freeze them, curse them, set them on fire or avoid them entirely! 

Ritual is out on Google Play and iOS!

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.hexage.ritual

App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1457554380?mt=8

Coming soon to Steam and Nintendo Switch!

http://www.hexage.net/ritual/index.html

In the video:
1:25 - First level up after killing few worms
2:55 - Portal opens when most of the enemies are dead
3:15 - Gaining new skills and spells in Revelation
5:00 - Collect Spell Orbs to activate their powerful effects
5:25 - Break destructible objects to release their content
6:45 - Changing Spells. Glyph of Implosion equipped instead of Teleport
8:10 - Smashing pumpk... Mana Pods
9:40 - Walk of Flame sets enemies on fire
11:00 - Rolling sphere breaks objects, triggers sigils and crushes enemies
11:25 - Wounded by enemy spells and almost dead. Level up saves us
13:20 - First death! Red Seal of Resurrection activates. Alive again to collect the gravestone
14:15 - Choose which level to play. All levels are repeatable and give EXP
